name: Starship Delivery
description:
This is a demo/prototype.

In this game, you travel from planet to planet, exploring each one to find missions, resources to collect, and facilities to refill your fuel and oxygen, or upgrade their capacities.

If you're low on fuel, your ship will move slower until you can find a fuel station and purchase fuel using credits.

Running out of oxygen will result in death, and the game will end. The goal is to visit as many planets as possible while surviving for as many days as possible.

Completing missions earns you credits that you can spend on refilling fuel and oxygen or buying upgrades. Use the radar in the upper right corner to navigate each planet. To leave a planet, you must wait a full day, and you will receive a notification. Use your time wisely to ensure you've completed everything before departing.
